biotools.summary:
Approach to combine the knowledge from spectral databases like MassBank with the multitude of candidates generated by fragmenters such as MetFrag.
The functionality of the original MetFusion application has been integrated into MetFrag, MetFusion itself has been deactivated.

bioschemas.name: MetFusion
